tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Conservative Dentistry,Dental Fillings,
review: Dr. Shravan has completely changed the way I smile. I‚Äôm so glad I paid him a visit because I had a lot of past work on my teeth which needed correction. He was to the point and explained each and everything very well that was needed to be done. I‚Äôm so glad I trusted him with my teeth because he has done marvelous work on them and made me more confident with my smile. He even changed my outlook on dentistry and in general dental health and the importance of it. This doctor will take no shortcuts and do the work as precisely as he can. Thank you very much, Dr. Shravan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shraval Chawla is an excellent dentist and has amazing chairside manner. He is very passionate about his work and always explains everything he is going to do before he starts the work. I think this is extremely important! I have visited dentists in the past who are in your mouth doing things, and you have to sit there feeling awkward and nervous because you don‚Äôt know exactly what is happening. I really appreciated Dr. Chawla taking the time to explain every step and showing the professionalism to stand by his work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Dental Cleaning,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),Tooth Filling,
review: I had a few issues to fix that I needed done quickly. Dr. Chawla was very accommodating and able to quickly make a plan for the treatment. He made sure I am comfortable through out the process and I understand each step (what is happening, why, alternate options). He was in constant touch even after the appointment in case of any pain. I have visited various dentists and I would highly recommend Dr. Chawla who is professional, friendly *** **** ******* *** **** *** ****** *********** *** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience overall, the doctor was extremely understanding, i reall appreciated that Doctor Shravan took the time to explain the problem with my teeth to me and offered me multiple treatment options and discussed them with me in detail and helped me make the right choice for my treatment. Upon arrival i did not have to wait at all and was taken to the treatment chair upon immediately. The staff were very courteous and the doctor had a really calm attitude which helped me relax....i dont normally enjoy going to the dentist but this time i didnt mind. They have all the latest equipment and you can get all procedures and treatments under one roof and are very reasonably priced for the quality of treatment received. I would highly recommend this dentist.
reply_text: Hi Daniel, thank you so much for the kind words. Hope you work as hard now on your maintenance And regular follow ups to prevent long term problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shravan was so soft spoken & friendly. He explained to me about the situation of my cavity in such a simple way that I was so satisfied & calm before he even started the procedure. He has light hands & so good attitude. I‚Äôm really happy with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

review:
Always have had an incredible experience with Dr. Chawla. I visit Bay Dental every six months for a check up and Dr. Chawla has consistently over delivered on the experience.
